refnamediv.refpurpose: Constants and functions related to rendering checkerboards.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: #define GIMP_CHECK_SIZE #define GIMP_CHECK_SIZE_SM #define GIMP_CHECK_DARK #define GIMP_CHECK_LIGHT void gimp_checks_get_shades (GimpCheckType type, guchar *light, guchar *dark);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Constants and functions related to rendering checkerboards.

refsect2.title: GIMP_CHECK_SIZE
refsect2.para: The default checkerboard size in pixels. This is configurable in the core but GIMP plug-ins can't access the user preference and should use this constant instead.

refsect2.title: GIMP_CHECK_SIZE_SM
refsect2.para: The default small checkerboard size in pixels.

refsect2.title: GIMP_CHECK_DARK
refsect2.para: The dark gray value for the default checkerboard pattern.

refsect2.title: GIMP_CHECK_LIGHT
refsect2.para: The light gray value for the default checkerboard pattern.

refsect2.title: gimp_checks_get_shades ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the actual shades of gray to use when drawing a checkerboard for a certain GimpCheckType.

listitem.simpara: return location for the light shade
return location for the dark shade
